questions.quote: Wow. You're so pious. I really respect that. You know when you die, you're gonna get some special attention.
These pretzels are making me thirsty.  Boy, these pretzels are making me thirsty.
Yeah, yeah, well, because of the cane. You should see the bathroom they gave me!
Jerry, it's fantastic. I love the people over there. They- they treat me so great. You know they think I'm handicapped, they gave me this incredible office, a great view.
Um, you know I'm starting to think that maybe lobster isn't the way to go.
Frank, now listen to me. Two hundred Jewish singles need you. This is your chance to make it all right again.
What are you kidding? We look great! You know what this pudding needs? The skin on the top, you know like your mother used to make it on the stove.
Elaine, do you think I would go willy-nilly into a situation so obviously fraught with potential complications?
Boy, I am really surprised at you.  You are the last person I figured would do something like this. I mean, George, yeah, I can see that. Even Jerry. But not you, Elaine...
So, George told me that you left the drink next to Dick's on purpose.
